thread.title: Frontdesk Anywhere Continues to Strengthen Management Team With Appointment of Kevin Tatem as Managing Director, Asia Pacific

author: cnbc.com
title: Frontdesk Anywhere Continues to Strengthen Management Team With Appointment of Kevin Tatem as Managing Director, Asia Pacific
text:
SAN FRANCISCO, April 18, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Frontdesk Anywhere (FDA), the award-winning, cloud-based hotel Property Management System (PMS), continues to bolster its global strength with the appointment of Kevin Tatem as managing director, Asia Pacific (APAC). Tatem will be based at Frontdesk Anywhere ’s Bangkok office, reporting directly to Joe Kiernan, CEO.
Kevin Tatem, Managing Director, Asia Pacific Frontdesk Anywhere
According to Kiernan, Tatem’s depth of experience in leading teams and building businesses and strategic partnerships across APAC will significantly benefit Frontdesk Anywhere as the company expands its suite of software integrations and focuses on delivering industry-leading, cloud-based PMS solutions to independent hoteliers and lodging groups around the world.
‘I am confident that Kevin’s business development savvy and his knowledge of our industry will give him the tools to make an immediate impact as we expand our business and focus on driving value, affordability and ease-of-use for our customers,’ said Kiernan. ‘In addition to leading our operation in Asia Pacific, Kevin will guide our sales teams worldwide as we continue to build and strengthen a best-in-class organization.’
Tatem joins Frontdesk Anywhere after serving for almost a decade in various roles for Sydney, Australia-based Site Minder , a leading cloud platform for hotel room inventory and rate management, most recently as director of strategic partnerships for APAC. At SiteMinder , he was widely credited with introducing the brand to Southeast Asia and significantly growing its customer base across the region.
Earlier in his career, Tatem served in sales management and business development roles for computer software and insurance financial firms in APAC, including Apex Consulting, AEGON, Hubb Financial Group and the global training and consulting provider, Pink Elephant. He is a dynamic speaker and panelist, frequently sharing his insights and expertise at industry events.
‘I am extremely excited to be joining a company that I have admired greatly over the years,’ Tatem said. ‘I look forward to adding value to the business and expanding Frontdesk Anywhere ’s presence in this important region of the world.’
Frontdesk Anywhere focuses on converging processes traditionally performed by separate systems into a single, all-in-one productivity application for hotel owners and operators. Modules are seamlessly integrated within the application and accessible from any computer or mobile device, saving hoteliers countless hours of human time while enabling them to make better business decisions while enhancing the guest experience.
‘Developing a scalable, global sales strategy for the business and a regionally-based, globally-capable customer service function will be two of my most exciting challenges,’ Tatem added.
ABOUT FRONTDESK ANYWHERE
Frontdesk Anywhere is an award-winning cloud-based property management system for independent hotels and management groups. It provides hoteliers with a platform that streamlines operations, increases revenue and enhances the guest experience. Based in San Francisco with offices worldwide, Frontdesk Anywhere currently serves customers in more than 45 countries. www.frontdeskanywhere.com .
